name: newslettr
title: Newslettr
desc: A landing page template for Newsletter Creators.
article:
Level up your newsletter with this Astro Theme meticulously crafted with Tailwind CSS for newsletter publications. Setup a custom website to grow your subscriber list and start monetising your newsletter in no time.


Whatever the newsletter platform youâre using you can easily capture email addresses, link to view past issues, tell more about your story, customise your Thank You page and start monetising your publication with third party tools like Passionfroot, Paved or Tally. This template is perfect to take your newsletter to the next level!
